channel.title: electron on Xueshan Chen
channel.description: Recent content in electron on Xueshan Chen

item.title: Set up an Electron Project with VUE
item.description: Download Resources Node.js Node.js download using node -v npm -v to check. Vue initial Vue by using the command: npm install -g @vue/cli # OR yarn global add @vue/cli using vue --version to check Create a new Vue project create vue create [vue-electorn-demo-name] run the project npm run serve Add electron Using vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder vue add electron-builder Run Project in Electron npm run eletron:serve the project will look like:
